title: Norskov
resume: Norskov is a police drama that takes place in an industrial city in  northern Denmark. The city is raw and unsentimental, and the financial  crisis has left its mark, but there is still a lot of community spirit  and empowerment. In the series we follow the policeman Tom Noack, who returns to the  city he left almost 20 years ago, and his two childhood friends who in  the meantime have become the mayor and primary contractor.
